title: Responsive Mobile-First UI
content: Tested for small mobile screens to large monitors

title: Smooth Transitions
content: On changing screen sizes, elements strech to their new dimensions

title: Testimonials Board
content: Testimonials are feedbacks you receive from the clients you teach. Good testimonials raise credibility

title: Dark Mode
content: Use the Dark toggle to reduce eye strain in low-light environments

title: Opt-in Form UI
content: Interested users can opt in to register with their emails and other info, so you can get back to them
